Download Your Free Report from Pivotal Labs <http://pivotallabs.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/PL-Report-Financial-Services-Investing-in-a-Mobile-Future-Q2141.pdf>
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for your interest in "Investing in a Mobile Future: A Report on Investment Trends in Mobile by Banking, Financial, and Insurance Companies" by Pivotal Labs.
Please click here to access the paper <http://pivotallabs.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/PL-Report-Financial-Services-Investing-in-a-Mobile-Future-Q2141.pdf>.
If you have any questions, reply to this email and I'll respond right away.
Sincerely, Arunan Sri Business Development Manager
